2000.context: NetApp, Inc. is a data management and storage company focused on enterprise storage, cloud data services, and hybrid cloud. NAS storage leader. Filer appliances for enterprises.

competitors.notes: Enterprise storage solutions provider

2010.context: NetApp, Inc. is a data management and storage company focused on enterprise storage, cloud data services, and hybrid cloud. Flash storage adoption. Cloud partnerships.

competitors.name: Western Digital

2015.context: NetApp, Inc. is a data management and storage company focused on enterprise storage, cloud data services, and hybrid cloud. Data fabric vision. SolidFire acquisition for all-flash.

competitors.name: Dell EMC
competitors.notes: Market leader with Unity, PowerMax, and comprehensive storage portfolio following EMC acquisition

competitors.name: Pure Storage
competitors.notes: All-flash storage specialist disrupting traditional storage with Evergreen model, growing rapidly

competitors.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
competitors.notes: Major competitor with Nimble Storage and 3PAR all-flash solutions

competitors.name: Oracle
competitors.notes: Integrated hardware and cloud infrastructure offerings

competitors.name: Nimble Storage
competitors.notes: Predictive all-flash and hybrid flash arrays (acquired by HPE in 2017)

competitors.name: Amazon Web Services
competitors.notes: Cloud storage with S3 and EBS, disrupting traditional storage market

2020.context: NetApp, Inc. is a data management and storage company focused on enterprise storage, cloud data services, and hybrid cloud. Cloud data services. Azure NetApp Files, AWS FSx.
